/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a corridor of urban life. Cars and buses are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's active transportation system. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and adding a geometric contrast to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is bathed in natural daylight, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
